attributes.additional_details: As I have yet to meet anyone who believes OfWat, OfGen, OfReg, OfTel or any of these publicly funded bodies do a good job - except on behalf of the Corporations - we should support the governments austerity measures and abandon these bodies, deferring instead to European Counterparts. Indeed, ever since the previous Prime minister signed the Copenhagen Treaty to make European Law superior over English Common Law in secret, we the public have experienced a steady decline in UK Consumer Rights to the point where it is no longer financially safe to purchase any goods or services.
